wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Macdonell  (1 August 1846 – 17 March 1921) was a British jurist. He was King's Remembrancer (1912–1920) and invested as a Knight Commander of the Order of the Bath. Shaw of Dunfermline gives a prefatory biography in Historical Trials.John Macdonnell married writer and journalist Agnes Harrison in 1873.
